headline.main: SCHWARZKOPF TO RUN POLICE FORCE IN IRAN; Ex-Superintendent of New Jersey Force to Guard Vital Areas

lead_paragraph: TEHERAN, Iran, Sept. 1 (AP) -- Colonel H. Norman Schwarzkopf, U.S.A., who ten years ago as superintendent of the New Jersey State Police directed the investigation into the kidnap-murder of the Lindbergh baby, arrived today in Iran to reorganize the national police of this strategically important country.

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
